org.geotools.referencefork.referencing.operation.transform
Class LogarithmicTransform1D

java.lang.Object
  org.geotools.referencefork.referencing.operation.transform.AbstractMathTransform
      org.geotools.referencefork.referencing.operation.transform.LogarithmicTransform1D
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, org.opengis.referencing.operation.MathTransform, org.opengis.referencing.operation.MathTransform1D
public class LogarithmicTransform1D
extends AbstractMathTransform
implements org.opengis.referencing.operation.MathTransform1D, java.io.Serializable

A one dimensional, logarithmic transform. Input values x are converted into output values y using the following equation:

y  =  offset + logbase(x)   =   offset + ln(x)/ln(base)

This transform is the inverse of ExponentialTransform1D.

Since:
2.0
Version:
$Id: LogarithmicTransform1D.java 29092 2008-02-05 20:47:31Z desruisseaux $
Author:
Martin Desruisseaux
